languages.text: The character can {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} attacks that normally cannot be dodged, including {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}.
languages.original_text: Персонаж может {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклоняться{/g} от атак, от которых в обычном случае уклониться нельзя, в том числе от {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}психосил{/g}.

traits.locale_text: The character can dodge even the attacks that cannot be dodged, including psychic powers.
The character can dodge attacks that normally cannot be dodged, including psychic powers.
The character can {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} attacks that normally cannot be dodged, including {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}.

languages.text: El personaje puede {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquivar{/g} ataques que normalmente no se pueden esquivar, incluyendo {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}poderes psíquicos{/g}.
languages.original_text: The character can {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} attacks that normally cannot be dodged, including {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}.

traits.locale_text: El personaje puede {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquivar{/g} ataques que normalmente no se pueden esquivar, incluyendo {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}poderes psíquicos{/g}.

languages.text: このキャラクターは、通常は回避できない攻撃を{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}できるようになる（{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}サイキック・パワー{/g}を含む）
languages.original_text: The character can {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} attacks that normally cannot be dodged, including {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}.

traits.locale_text: このキャラクターは、通常は回避できない攻撃を{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}できるようになる（{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}サイキック・パワー{/g}を含む）

languages.text: 角色可以{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}通常情况下无法闪避的攻击，包括{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}灵能能力{/g}。
languages.original_text: The character can {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} attacks that normally cannot be dodged, including {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 角色可以{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}闪避{/g}通常情况下无法闪避的攻击，包括{g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}灵能能力{/g}。

languages.text: Der Charakter kann Angriffen {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}ausweichen{/g}, denen er normalerweise nicht ausweichen kann, einschließlich {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psionischer Kräfte{/g}.
languages.original_text: The character can {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} attacks that normally cannot be dodged, including {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Der Charakter kann Angriffen {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}ausweichen{/g}, denen er normalerweise nicht ausweichen kann, einschließlich {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}psionischer Kräfte{/g}.

languages.text: Le personnage peut {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiver{/g} des attaques qu'il ne peut habituellement pas esquiver, y compris des {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}pouvoirs psychiques{/g}.

languages.text: Персонаж может {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклоняться{/g} от атак, от которых в обычном случае уклониться нельзя, в том числе от {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}психосил{/g}.

languages.text: Karakter, {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}ruhsezi güçleri{/g} kaynaklı olanlar da dâhil olmak üzere normalde kaçınılamayan saldırılardan {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınabilir{/g}.
